participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, loves the outdoors and exploring new trails. Enjoys a good cup of coffee to start the day.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i do not drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to play pretend and has a vivid imagination. Enjoys spending time with friends and family.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. my best friend lives next door. i don't pick up my toys. i'm four.
